description: This is a shell script used for self-healing network connectivity issues. It performs tasks such as resetting the router, pinging gateways and DNS servers, and taking corrective actions based on network health checks.

methods.name: getCorrectiveActionState
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the corrective action flag from system configuration.

methods.name: calcRandTimetoStartPing
methods.description: Calculates a random delay for starting ping tests to avoid simultaneous network checks.

methods.name: resetRouter
methods.description: Issues a command to reboot the router.

methods.name: resetNeeded
methods.description: Determines if a reset is needed based on process name, and initiates a reset if required.

methods.name: runDNSPingTest
methods.description: Performs a DNS ping test, verifies URL resolution, and takes corrective action if resolution fails.

methods.name: runPingTest
methods.description: Performs a ping test to the default gateway and triggers a router reset if ping fails.
